item.title: Working with secret in Kubernetes - GitOps (part 1)
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: Kubernetes Secret is one of the most important suject that you need to deal with when deploying your applications into Kubernetes. As you may know, the K8S secrets are encoded (not encrypted) by design. In this article, you’ll explore some ways that can help you secure your secrets. We will go through : Bitnami Sealed Secrets Mozilla SOPS CSI Store Driver ArgoCD Vault Plugin BITNAMI SEALED SECRETS Bitnami Sealed Secret is used/deployed as a Kubernetes Controller.
